AboutUs.HM Plast has been operating for over 15: HM Plast has been operating for over 15 years as a company specialized in the plastic and mold sector. It has a leading position in the medical and educational sectors, as well as manufacturing various products for sports equipment, plastic platforms, toys and the automotive sectors. It offers end-to-end services in the projecting, design, production and mold projecting processes of plastic products. It offers innovative design and production solutions to meet the needs of customers.
AboutUs.HM Plast is working resolutely to be rec: HM Plast is working resolutely to be recognized as a leading brand specialized in the plastic and mold sector and to become a preferred supplier worldwide. We strive to meet the needs of its customers and exceed their expectations by offering high quality plastic products, including contract manufacturing and R&D studies. It aims to be a pioneer in the sector with its understanding of innovation and perfectionism.

HomePage.We deliver customized manufacturing solu: We deliver customized manufacturing solutions for every industry using a broad range of materials.
HomePage.HM Plast provides comprehensive plastic: HM Plast provides comprehensive plastic and mold solutions —from concept to production— customized for each client.
HomePage.We serve key industries including Medica: We serve key industries including Medical, Educational, Sports Equipment, Plastic Platforms, Toys, the Automotive industry and more.
HomePage.We work with molds made out different ma: We work with molds made out different materials, such as wood, plastic or metal, suited at client's request.
HomePage.HM Plast has been working with state-of-: HM Plast has been working with state-of-the-art technology in mold and plastic solutions for over 15 years.

HomePage.We make your ideas a reality: We make your ideas a reality.
HomePage.PlanningPhaseDescription: Get in touch with us through WhatsApp or Email at info@hmplast.com.tr and start a conversation about what you desire to build, we'll take you step by step and give a quote for each item.
HomePage.After coming to a deal on what needs to: After coming to a deal on what needs to be manufactured, we'll proceed to build the prototype's design and get in more specifics of what you'll need.
HomePage.ManufacturingPhaseDescription: After designs are done, the products requested will start to be manufactured and get ready to be shipped. We can also deliver the products to any country you need.
HomePage.We deliver customized solutions in every: We deliver customized solutions in every industry using a broad range of materials.
HomePage.We'd love to hear from you! Reach out to: We'd love to hear from you! Reach out to us via WhatsApp or Email for any inquiries or support.
